about_the_game:
This is the demo of award-winning Full Void, a 2D Puzzle Platformer Adventure set in a dystopian future, where an AI has taken over humanity. Only children are still free from its control, but for how long?

You play as a young teenager, scared and alone, trying to survive in a hostile environment with only your hacking skills at your disposal.

Try the demo and dive into an adventure that will keep you on your toes from the very beginning.

Suitable for a wide range of age and sensibility, although its dark settings, Full Void is the spiritual successor to classic cinematic puzzle platformers such as Prince of Persia, Another World (Out of This World) and Flashback, with a modern twist, innovative visual and gameplay mechanics.

Features

- Environmental Storytelling;

- Ability to hack machinery to solve puzzles;

- Immersive and intense atmosphere;

- Compelling, Amiga MOD sounds;

- Thousands of hand-drawn animations in beautiful pixel art.
detailed_description:
This is the demo of award-winning Full Void, a 2D Puzzle Platformer Adventure set in a dystopian future, where an AI has taken over humanity. Only children are still free from its control, but for how long?

You play as a young teenager, scared and alone, trying to survive in a hostile environment with only your hacking skills at your disposal.

Try the demo and dive into an adventure that will keep you on your toes from the very beginning.

Suitable for a wide range of age and sensibility, although its dark settings, Full Void is the spiritual successor to classic cinematic puzzle platformers such as Prince of Persia, Another World (Out of This World) and Flashback, with a modern twist, innovative visual and gameplay mechanics.

Features

- Environmental Storytelling;

- Ability to hack machinery to solve puzzles;

- Immersive and intense atmosphere;

- Compelling, Amiga MOD sounds;

- Thousands of hand-drawn animations in beautiful pixel art.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.15 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 or higher
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Full Void Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560/Equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is the demo of award winning Full Void, a 2D Cinematic Puzzle Platformer set in a dystopian future. A young teenager, scared and alone, must use their hacking skills to defeat a rogue AI that keeps mankind oppressed.
